mapper.insert: insert into up_worker_info (proj_id, name, age, sex, birthday, nation, current_address, political, household_register, mobile, education_degree, card_no_address, card_no_start_date, card_no_end_date, card_no, card_no_type, card_no_issuing, healthy, is_diseases, create_date, update_date ) values (#{projId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nation,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{political,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{householdRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{educationDegree,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cardNoAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNoStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cardNoEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNoType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cardNoIssuing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{healthy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDiseases,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.select:
select
distinct
from up_worker_info
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT a.id, a.salary_bank_no as 'salaryBankNo', a.salary_money as 'salaryMoney', a.proj_id as 'projId', a.worker_id as 'workerId', g.company_id as 'companyId', w.card_no as 'cardNo', w.name as 'name', a.group_id as 'groupId', a.entry_date as 'entryDate', a.leave_date as 'leaveDate', a.contract_start_date as 'contractStartDate', a.contract_end_date as 'contractEndDate', (case when a.status = 0 then 1 ELSE 0 end)as 'status', (case when w.sex = 0 then 2 ELSE 1 end)as 'sex', w.mobile, w.current_address as 'currentAddress', w.nation, w.education_degree as 'educationDegree', f.file_path as 'headImage', p.report_code as 'projNo', g.report_code as 'groupNo', uci.corp_code as 'corpCode' FROM up_worker_in a LEFT JOIN up_worker_info w on w.id = a.worker_id LEFT JOIN up_group_info g on g.id = a.group_id LEFT JOIN up_company_info uci on uci.id = g.company_id LEFT JOIN up_project_info p on p.id = a.proj_id LEFT JOIN up_file f ON f.table_id = w.id and f.table_module = '2' WHERE a.id = #{id}
